name: Clef des Iles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiancee and I just returned from a 5 day trip to the Seychelles. We didn't know what to expect but were absolutely amazed. We stayed on Mahe in a beautiful place called Clef des Iles and it was so wonderful that we almost didn't want to leave our villa to visit the rest of the island.
reviews.title: Fantastic Place - absolutely recommend it

likes.liked: — It was new. The beach was at your back door. The owners. The relaxed feeling.
likes.disliked: — The back wall opens up completely so you can see out. That also means others can see in. You get used to it though and I wouldn't trade the view for anything.

aka: Clef Des Iles Hotel Mahe Island
description: Clef des Iles is composed of 4 duplexes located literally on the beach. Each duplex (around 120 m2 each) has two large attic bedrooms facing the majestuous Silhouette and North Island. The kitchen is fully equipped and internet is freely available through a wireless system. This ideal “on the beach home” is surrounded by charming restaurants and offers easy access to water sport facilities. The discrete Clef des Iles team takes care of daily cleaning.
